Class Weapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • groupproject.Entity
      • groupproject.Weapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Entity>

    public class Weapon
extends Entity
    Extension of Entity Describes a single weapon entity in the game.

      • Weapon

        public Weapon(Manager manager,
              java.lang.String name,
              Room room,
              float xpos,
              float ypos,
              float scale,
              float width,
              float height)
        Initialises a new weapon instance to be dropped onto the map
        Parameters:
        manager - current instance of manager
        xpos - starting x position (0,0) being top left corner of window
        ypos - starting y position
        scale - initial sprite scale
        width - width of Entity (pixels)
        height - height of Entity (pixels)
